about_the_game:
All aboard the Murder Express, a brand new DLC for Sker Ritual!

Get on the right track and have your tickets at the ready.



Murder Express DLC unlocks a new mask and exclusive items to express yourself. Don’t get derailed on your journey to Sker Island, the villagers are dying to meet you.

Don’t get delayed when you choo choo choose The Train Conductor mask. Take your seats and get comfy with the Train Carriage Background and let everyone know it’s time to depart and blow off some steam with the Train Whistle showing you’re the rail deal with the Train Emblem.


Ticket’s Please!




This pack includes 4 new items:

Train Conductor Mask


An Exclusive Premium Mask of the Train Conductor

Train Carriage


An Exclusive Premium Animated Menu Background of the Train Carriage

Train Whistle


An Exclusive In-Game Voice Line to get everyone onboard

Train Emblem


An Exclusive Train Emblem Player Icon to express yourself

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

short_description: Get on the right track and have your tickets at the ready for the Murder Express, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
